certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

metadata.cwe: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
metadata.description: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application use no DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to no hardware resources.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings:
"help_rules_summary" : "Fill in each row and column with numbers from 1 to grid size (4-9). Numbers may only be used once per row and column.

 Thick lines indicate 'cages', where each cage has a math puzzle to be solved. For example, '5+' means all numbers in that cage must add up to 5.

 Numbers may be used more than once per cage, as long as there is only one of each number per row or column."
"about_developers_summary" : "Adam Queler, Forked from Holoken 1.1.1 by Amanda Chow, with much credit to Ben Buxton and Stephen Lee of Mathdoku"

"about_changelog_summary" : "v1.6.0 merged pencil mark option, infinite undo buffer v1.5.1 all autofill is recursive
 v1.4.1 fixed more serious lint errors
 v1.4 Fixed toasts, changed defaults to holodark and auto-remove
 migrated to gradle
 fixed crash when error and holding pencil
 v1.3 Forked from 1.1.1 on googlecode
 Incorporated 1.2 once I found it on github
 auto-pencil marks (needs option to turn off)
 better colors for Dark mode
 clearing single possibilites will remove pencil marks now…
 …but will crash eventually if there's a mistake
 v1.2 (I think I merged these in)
 * Coloured last modified cell
 * Centered options menu to work for 3.0 devices
 * Tweaked 480dp layout
 * Added operations menu
 v1.1.1
 * Fixed slight border bug
 v1.1
 * Shows streaks and average times in statistics
 * Changed time penalty
 * Added input mode, batch undo fixes
 * Auto-remove pencil marks, fix layout bug
 v1.0.3
 * Theme tweaks and multiple undo
 v1.0
 * Initial release"
"setting_default_game_grid_summary" : "Set the grid size for new games"
"setting_rate_app_summary" : "Rate HoloKen in the Google Play Store"

"help_instructions_summary" : "Fill up the grid squares using the number buttons. Toggle between pen, pencil and eraser modes to mark or clear possibilities. Quick toggle between input modes - select cell first or select number first.

 Long-press a cell for more hints (show mistakes, reveal cell, show solution).
 ^ warning: use of hints will add a time penalty and break your current streak

 Long-press the Pen/Pencil button to quickly pen in all singular Pencil marks.

 HoloKen will auto-save your game if you need to stop."

"about_website_summary" : "Report any bugs or suggestions at
https://github.com/queler/holokenmod"
"setting_remove_pencils_summary" : "In the same row or column as a penned number"

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
warning.description:
The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x04g-Testing-Cryptography.md#weak-random-number-generators

warning.title: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
warning.description:
App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
